title: Zoom Still Needs the Little People
sub_head: Focus on enterprise customers should pay off, provided consumer side doesn’t melt away too quickly
body:
The ironic challenge facing Zoom Video Communications is how to wean itself off the very customers that made it a household name.
Fiscal first-quarter results from the videoconferencing provider on Monday afternoon showed progress on that front. Revenue from enterprise customers jumped 31% year over year and now comprise a little over half its business on a quarterly basis. That well outpaced the company’s total revenue growth of 12% for the quarter.
